title: Alton Central School - Technology Integrationist
mainContent: Technology Integrationist and Computer Science teacher for Alton Central School, a K-8 Elementary. Responsible for all technology professional development and administration of online resources.

title: Google Project Management Professional
subContent: Those who earn the Google Project Management Certificate have completed six courses, developed by Google, that include hands-on, practice-based assessments and are designed to prepare them for introductory-level roles in Project Management. They are competent in initiating, planning and running both traditional and agile projects.

title: Google Data Analytics Professional
subContent: Those who earn the Google Data Analytics Certificate have completed eight courses, developed by Google, that include hands-on, practice-based assessments and are designed to prepare them for introductory-level roles in Data Analytics. They are competent in tools and platforms including spreadsheets, SQL, Tableau, and R. They know how to prepare, process, analyze, and share data for thoughtful action.
